last_episode_to_air.name: Smartphone
last_episode_to_air.overview: A husband who has addicted to gambling gifts a smartphone to his wife to make her learn new things. With the help of one of his friends, she quickly learns it as well. Will this smartness lead to a shocking consequence for the poor husband? A story on today’s reality “Smartphone”.
